item.title: Whodunnit? Network Analysis of British Mysteries
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE) library(tidyverse) ## Warning: package 'tidyverse' was built under R version 3.5.2 ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.2.1 ✓ purrr 0.3.3 ## ✓ tibble 2.1.3 ✓ dplyr 0.8.4 ## ✓ tidyr 1.0.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.3.1 ✓ forcats 0.4.0 ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.5.2 ## Warning: package 'tibble' was built under R version 3.
